name: Allan
shout: Thanks to Allan for his unique brand of humor and ability to lighten the mood!

name: Ben
shout: It's been great working with Ben the last few days. When something doesn't work, he continuously iterates until he finds the solution.!

name: Brendan
shout: Thanks to Brendan for always cheerfully and patiently providing assistance.

name: Liz
shout: Liz is always so cheerful and nice. And she cracks me up!

name: Garrett
shout: Garrett always cheers me up and make me laugh. He is sweet to check in with me with offers of help!

name: Jacob
shout: Jake is always willing to help and is EXTREMELY knowledgeable. He never judges questions and is very empathetic!

name: James
shout: James is always friendly and helpful. He is very sensitive about not telling you the answer but rather helps you uncover it yourself!

name: Jason S.
shout: Thanks to Jason S for being a patient teacher. He's also a great role model for a health lifestyle!

name: Jason N.
shout: Jason helped with some confusing things today. He's also quietly stylish with those awesome blue suede shoes!

name: Kamie
shout: Kamie is the best team player I know.  She's swift and a strong contributor and helps all think about problems in new ways.

name: Katie
shout: Katie rocked my world today! She is a really good communicator and has a lot of wisdom.

name: Kate
shout: Kate is very poised and serene even when things are not going well.  Thanks for being such a calming influence on our group!

name: Kim
shout: Kim is supportive, inclusive and fun to talk to. She lets me practice teaching, and also helps me see where I missed things by going too fast.

name: Madeleine
shout: Thanks to Madeleine for asking questions that are helpful and that I wouldnâ€™t think of myself during lecture.

name: Martha
shout: Martha is kind and super helpful!  She is also good at bringing people together in the group and getting everyone involved.

name: Matt
shout: HUGE shout-out to Matt! He stayed late to help me after hours.

name: Shawn
shout: Shawn is very generous with his time.  He helped me in my time of need with the jquery .empty() and .remove() methods!

name: Vas
shout: Vas reminds us all to keep the big picture in mind.  He also has a lot of spirit.  Thanks for asking such great questions!
